name: White Spot
address: White Spot Kensington, 6500 Hastings St, Burnaby, BC V5B 1S2, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Dippin' Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy breaded chicken tenders. Choice of dip.

hasMenuItem.name: The Legendary
hasMenuItem.description: Our traditional 1/4 lb 100% fresh Canadian beef burger with our signature Triple “O” sauce & a pickle. Served with your choice of side (extra charges may apply).

hasMenuItem.name: Dippin' Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy breaded chicken tenders, served with your choice of side (extra charges may apply).

hasMenuItem.name: World Famous Milkshakes
hasMenuItem.description: All made with our premium rich ice cream and topped with whipped cream. Choose from Chocolate, Vanilla Bean, Strawberry, Blueberry, Chocolate Espresso or Salted Caramel Brownie.

hasMenuItem.name: Nat's Original Beef Dip
hasMenuItem.description: Slow-roasted & tender Canadian Certified Angus Beef® piled high on garlic panini. Served with au jus. Served with your choice of side (extra charges may apply).

hasMenuItem.name: The White Spot Club
hasMenuItem.description: Turkey breast, bacon, lettuce, tomato, mayo & chili sauce on your choice of toasted white, multigrain, or sourdough. Served with your choice of side (extra charges may apply).

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
hasMenuItem.description: Herb-marinated BC chicken OR crispy buttermilk chicken wrapped in our salsa tortilla with crisp romaine, bacon & Parmesan, tossed in our signature Caesar dressing. Served with your choice of side (extra charges may apply).

hasMenuItem.name: The Spot's Zoo Sticks
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh breaded zucchini with our famous Zoo dip. Vegan without Zoo Dip.

hasMenuItem.name: Side Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Add a side of our signature Kennebec fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Spinach & Mushroom Fettuccine Alfredo
hasMenuItem.description: Parmesan cream sauce with sautéed mushrooms, green onion & spinach. Garlic bread.

hasMenuItem.name: Creamy Spaghetti Bolognese
hasMenuItem.description: Creamy Spaghetti Bolognese - Fire-roasted tomato meat & cream sauce with spinach & Spaghetti. Parmesan & garlic bread. (G) with gluten-free pasta & no bread.

hasMenuItem.name: New York Steak (9 oz)
hasMenuItem.description: Chargrilled 9 oz Canadian Certified Angus Beef® New York Striploin. Served with mashed potatoes & seasonal vegetables.

hasMenuItem.name: Would you like to add cutlery?
Chicken Pot Pie
hasMenuItem.description: Tender chicken in a home-style broth with potato, carrot, onion, celery & peas in a personal-sized savoury pie. Served with your choice of  Caesar or The Spot’s salad.

hasMenuItem.name: Home-style Pot Roast
hasMenuItem.description: Yorkshire pudding topped with mashed potaotes, tender braised beef, roasted tomato & mushroom beef au jus & horseradish crema. Roasted carrots & brussels sprouts.

hasMenuItem.name: Carrot Cake
hasMenuItem.description: Sweet, slightly spiced carrot cake with cream cheese icing, salted caramel sauce & whipped cream.

hasMenuItem.name: Buttermilk Chicken Cordon Brie Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy Buttermilk chicken, back bacon, creamy Brie, roasted mushrooms, arugula & grainy dijon mayo. Served with your choice of Caesar salad, The Spot's salad OR creamy coleslaw & fresh local fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Prawn & Bacon Carbonara
hasMenuItem.description: Ocean Wise prawns, crisp bacon, green peas & spaghetti in our creamy carbonara sauce. Parmesan & garlic bread.

hasMenuItem.name: Gluten-Free Prawn & Bacon Carbonara
hasMenuItem.description: Ocean Wise prawns, crisp bacon, green peas & gluten free penne in our creamy carbonara sauce. Parmesan cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: Mini Yorkies
hasMenuItem.description: Three mini yorkies topped with mashed potatoes, tender braised beef, beef au jus & horseradish crema.

hasMenuItem.name: Braised Beef Burger
hasMenuItem.description: 100% fresh Canadian beef burger with tender braised beef, provolone, banana peppers & arugula. Savoury tomato jam & grainy dijon mayo. Served with your choice of Caesar salad, The Spot's salad OR creamy coleslaw & fresh local fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Granville Island Brewing Island Lager
hasMenuItem.description: Granville's original craft lager born in 1984. Brewed with Pale Malt, select bittering Hops and noble Hersbruckeraroma Hops to deliver a full-bodied crisp lager. 5.0% ABV

hasMenuItem.name: Granville Island English Bay Pale Ale
hasMenuItem.description: Following the same recipe since 1987 when the better beer movement was just beginning, this malt-forward original is not too bitter and brings forth the luscious, caramel complexity of a classic Canadian "microbrew". IBU 18 | ABV 5%

hasMenuItem.name: Red Racer Street Legal Pilsner
hasMenuItem.description: Dealcoholized craft beer brewed by Central City Brewing. ABV 0.5%

hasMenuItem.name: Pinot Gris, Gray Monk Estate Winery (750ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Smooth & balanced with juicy orchard fruit flavours accented by delicate spice. ABV 13.1%

hasMenuItem.name: Rosé, Saintly (750ml)
hasMenuItem.description: A vibrant, refreshing rosé with flavours of strawberry, grapefruit & subtle floral notes. The perfect balance of dry, fresh & fruity. ABV 12.3%

hasMenuItem.name: Sauvignon Blanc, Kim Crawford (750ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh, vibrant acidity & tropical fruit flavours with a passion fruit, melon & grapefruit notes.

hasMenuItem.name: Pinot Grigio, Inniskillin Okanagan Estate (750ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Vibrant tropical fruit, lively acidity &  a clean, crisp finish. ABV 12.5%

hasMenuItem.name: Chardonnay, Alias (750ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Well-balanced, fruit forward flavours of ripe apple & pear, complemented by subtle notes of vanilla & oak.

hasMenuItem.name: Merlot, Jackson-Triggs (750ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Jackson-Triggs Okanagan Estate Reserve. Medium-bodied with red plum, strawberry jam & rich mocha notes. ABV 12%

hasMenuItem.name: Cabernet Sauvignon Tom Gore Vineyards (750ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Blackberry, black currant & black cherry with toasted with toasted notes of oak & brown spice.

hasMenuItem.name: Pinot Noir, Vint by Robert Mondavi (750ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Vibrant fruit flavours of cherry and raspberry balanced with notes of vanilla.

hasMenuItem.name: Cabernet Merlot, Sandhill (750ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Full-bodied & balanced with notes  of black currant, toasted oak & cocoa. ABV 14.5%

hasMenuItem.name: Sauvignon Blanc, Jackson-Triggs (750ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Jackson-Triggs Okanagan Estate Reserve. Crisp with grassy & citrus lime notes. ABV 12.3%

hasMenuItem.name: White Claw Lime
hasMenuItem.description: White Claw® Hard Seltzer is made from a blend of carbonated water, our gluten free spirit base, and a hint of natural fruit flavour. ABV 5%

hasMenuItem.name: Lonetree Cider
hasMenuItem.description: An authentic dry cider made with real BC apples from the Okanagan Valley. Gluten free. ABV 5.5%

hasMenuItem.name: White Claw Black Cherry
hasMenuItem.description: White Claw® Hard Seltzer is made from a blend of carbonated water, our gluten free spirit base, and a hint of natural fruit flavour. ABV 5%

hasMenuItem.name: World Famous Milkshakes
hasMenuItem.description: All made with our premium rich ice cream and topped with whipped cream. Choose from Chocolate, Vanilla Bean, Strawberry, Blueberry, Chocolate Espresso or Salted Caramel Brownie.

hasMenuItem.name: Dippin' Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy breaded chicken tenders. Choice of dip.

hasMenuItem.name: Southwest Chicken Quesadilla
hasMenuItem.description: Herb-marinated BC chicken, roasted corn, green onion, mozzarella & Cheddar cheese. Jalapeno ranch & pico de gallo.

hasMenuItem.name: The Spot's Zoo Sticks
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh breaded zucchini with our famous Zoo dip. Vegan without Zoo Dip.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Wings
hasMenuItem.description: Salt & pepper OR Frank's® RedHot® sauce, served with our famous Zoo dip.

hasMenuItem.name: Side Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Add a side of our signature Kennebec fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Clam Chowder Bowl
hasMenuItem.description: Our signature soup.

hasMenuItem.name: Cheesy Bacon Perogies
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy fried perogies & sautéed onions in a cheese sauce, bacon, paprika, green onion & drizzled with Zoo Dip.

hasMenuItem.name: Poutine
hasMenuItem.description: Our signature Kennebec fries topped with gravy and cheese curds.

hasMenuItem.name: Onion Rings
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy fried onion rings with our famous Zoo dip.

hasMenuItem.name: Side Dip
hasMenuItem.description: Add a side dip of your choice.

hasMenuItem.name: Side Gravy
hasMenuItem.description: Add a side of delicious beef gravy.

hasMenuItem.name: Side Pickles
hasMenuItem.description: Add a side of our signature sliced pickles.

hasMenuItem.name: Crispy Fried Coconut Prawns
hasMenuItem.description: Coconut crusted prawns served with our sweet & spicy pineapple sambal.

hasMenuItem.name: Mini Yorkies
hasMenuItem.description: Three mini yorkies topped with mashed potatoes, tender braised beef, beef au jus & horseradish crema.

hasMenuItem.name: Nat's Crispy Dry Ribs
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy fried dry ribs with salt & pepper.

hasMenuItem.name: Crispy Brussels Sprouts
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy fried brussels sprouts tossed with Caesar dressing, bacon & Parmesan.

hasMenuItem.name: The Spot's House Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Artisan greens, edamame, cucumbers, dried cranberries, carrot ribbons & cherry tomatoes tossed in our house-made vinaigrette. Served with garlic bread.

hasMenuItem.name: Farro Power Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Local artisan greens, spinach, farro, broccoli, radish, cucumber, edamame, gala apple, cherry tomatoes & red onion. Garnished with gingered pecans, feta & dried fruit. Avocado crema. Make it gluten-friendly with no farro.

hasMenuItem.name: Buttermilk Chicken Cobb Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy buttermilk chicken, shredded iceberg,  fresh avocado, back bacon, hard-boiled egg, cherry tomatoes, corn, cilantro, Cheddar & tortilla strips. Jalapeno ranch.

hasMenuItem.name: Classic Caesar Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Crisp romaine, croutons, our classic Caesar dressing & Parmesan cheese. Served with garlic bread.

hasMenuItem.name: The Legendary
hasMenuItem.description: Our traditional 1/4 lb 100% fresh Canadian beef burger with our signature Triple “O” sauce & a pickle. Served with your choice of side (extra charges may apply).

hasMenuItem.name: Bacon Cheddar Burger
hasMenuItem.description: 6 oz 100% fresh Canadian beef burger with crispy bacon, Cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato & Triple “O” sauce. Served with your choice of side (extra charges may apply).

hasMenuItem.name: Double Double Burger
hasMenuItem.description: A 1/2 lb of 100% fresh Canadian beef. Double beef patties, double cheese, lettuce, tomato, Triple "O" sauce & double dills. Served with your choice of side (extra charges may apply).

hasMenuItem.name: Monty Mushroom Bigger Burger
hasMenuItem.description: 6 oz 100% fresh Canadian beef burger with Jack cheese, roasted mushrooms, lettuce, tomato & Triple “O” sauce. Served with your choice of side (extra charges may apply).

hasMenuItem.name: BC Chicken Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Chargrilled fresh BC chicken breast, Cheddar cheese, bacon, lettuce, tomatoes, red onion, and Triple “O” sauce. Served with your choice of side (extra charges may apply).

hasMenuItem.name: Pacific Northwest Steelhead Burger
hasMenuItem.description: 5 oz Ocean Wise™ steelhead fillet with pickled onion, tartar sauce, arugula, tomato & mayo

hasMenuItem.name: Crispy Haddock Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Our crispy battered haddock with coleslaw, tomato & tartar sauce, on our Legendary bun. Served with your choice of side (extra charges may apply).

hasMenuItem.name: Brie & Mushroom Veggie Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Our crispy veggie patty with Brie, caramelized onions, roasted mushrooms, arugula, tomato & mayo. Served with your choice of side (extra charges may apply).

hasMenuItem.name: Nashville Chicken Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy BC chicken thigh tossed with our Nashville hot sauce, signature pickles, savoy cabbage slaw & mayo.

hasMenuItem.name: Braised Beef Burger
hasMenuItem.description: 100% fresh Canadian beef burger with tender braised beef, provolone, banana peppers & arugula. Savoury tomato jam & grainy dijon mayo. Served with your choice of Caesar salad, The Spot's salad OR creamy coleslaw & fresh local fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Buttermilk Chicken Cordon Brie Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy Buttermilk chicken, back bacon, creamy Brie, roasted mushrooms, arugula & grainy dijon mayo. Served with your choice of Caesar salad, The Spot's salad OR creamy coleslaw & fresh local fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Dippin' Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy breaded chicken tenders, served with your choice of side (extra charges may apply).

hasMenuItem.name: Nat's Original Beef Dip
hasMenuItem.description: Slow-roasted & tender Canadian Certified Angus Beef® piled high on garlic panini. Served with au jus. Served with your choice of side (extra charges may apply).

hasMenuItem.name: The White Spot Club
hasMenuItem.description: Turkey breast, bacon, lettuce, tomato, mayo & chili sauce on your choice of toasted white, multigrain, or sourdough. Served with your choice of side (extra charges may apply).

hasMenuItem.name: Southwest Chicken Quesadilla Entree
hasMenuItem.description: Herb-marinated BC chicken, roasted corn, green onion, mozzarella & Cheddar cheese. Jalapeño ranch & pico de gallo, served with your choice of side.

hasMenuItem.name: Nat's Loaded Beef Dip
hasMenuItem.description: Slow-roasted Certified Angus Beef®, piled high on garlic panini bread. Loaded with Brie cheese & sautéed onion. Served with your choice of side (extra charges may apply).

hasMenuItem.name: Toasted Shrimp Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Lettuce, mayo & chili sauce on your choice of white, multigrain or sourdough. Served with your choice of side (extra charges may apply).

hasMenuItem.name: Turkey, Bacon & Brie Dip
hasMenuItem.description: Turkey breast, brie, bacon & cranberry onion jam, oven roasted on ciabatta. Served with tarragon beef au jus.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
hasMenuItem.description: Herb-marinated BC chicken OR crispy buttermilk chicken wrapped in our salsa tortilla with crisp romaine, bacon & Parmesan, tossed in our signature Caesar dressing. Served with your choice of side (extra charges may apply).

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Pot Pie
hasMenuItem.description: Tender chicken in a home-style broth with potato, carrot, onion, celery & peas in a personal-sized savoury pie. Served with your choice of  Caesar or The Spot’s salad.

hasMenuItem.name: New York Steak (9 oz)
hasMenuItem.description: Chargrilled 9 oz Canadian Certified Angus Beef® New York Striploin. Served with mashed potatoes & seasonal vegetables.

hasMenuItem.name: Baby Back Ribs
hasMenuItem.description: Choice of half or full rack. Fall off the bone goodness. Bulleit™ BBQ sauce served with your choice of side.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken, Broccoli & Cheese
hasMenuItem.description: Our famous creamy casserole with mushrooms & a hint of curry, oven baked with a buttery herb crust. Served with rice or your choice of side & Caesar or The Spot’s salad.

hasMenuItem.name: The Spot's Fish & Chips
hasMenuItem.description: A White Spot tradition. Two pieces of crispy battered haddock. Served with your choice of side (extra charges may apply).

hasMenuItem.name: Home-style Pot Roast
hasMenuItem.description: Yorkshire pudding topped with mashed potaotes, tender braised beef, roasted tomato & mushroom beef au jus & horseradish crema. Roasted carrots & brussels sprouts.

hasMenuItem.name: Spinach & Mushroom Fettuccine Alfredo
hasMenuItem.description: Parmesan cream sauce with sautéed mushrooms, green onion & spinach. Garlic bread.

hasMenuItem.name: Creamy Spaghetti Bolognese
hasMenuItem.description: Creamy Spaghetti Bolognese - Fire-roasted tomato meat & cream sauce with spinach & Spaghetti. Parmesan & garlic bread. (G) with gluten-free pasta & no bread.

review.reviewBody: Called White Spot ahead and they went out of their way to make this delicious order freezable for later.  Thank you, Kathleen & Scott.
Cakes are the best! Just as good as din in.
The Teriyaki Dunburi Bowl was too dry and pasty
the steak was way over done.   the rest was satisfactory
